href="#htoc-how-to-integrate-apple-search-ads-and-mmp">How to Integrate Apple Ads and MMP?</a></li></ul></div></div><p>A <strong>Mobile Measurement Partner (MMP)</strong> is a third-party platform that enables app marketers to accurately track, attribute, and analyze user activity. It measures key activites like user acquisition, engagement, and retention across all advertising sources to provide a complete performance picture for app campaigns.</p>
<p>MMPs provide a unified, real-time view of campaign performance by consolidating data from different channels. This unbiased attribution helps app marketers see which sources drive installs, in-app events, revenue and other metrics. MMP’s function is crucial for optimizing marketing spend, preventing fraud and complying with regulatory compliance.</p>
<p>Looking for an MMP and want to understand best tools and key aspects of each one? Keep reading to get answers.</p>
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="htoc-how-does-an-mmp-work">How does an MMP work?</h2>
<p>An MMP operates through a clear, multi-step process to ensure accurate mobile attribution and data analysis. The core mechanics of how MMPs work include:</p>
<ol start="1" class="wp-block-list">
<li id="htoc-sdk-integration-an-mmp-collects-install-and-in-app-event-data-after-its-software-development-kit-is-integrated-into-the-app"><strong>SDK integration</strong> – an MMP collects install and in-app event data after its Software Development Kit is integrated into the app.</li>
<li id="htoc-attribution-it-assigns-credit-for-installs-using-device-id-matching-probabilistic-methods-and-privacy-focused-solutions-like-skadnetwork-on-ios"><strong>Attribution</strong> – it assigns credit for installs using device ID matching, probabilistic methods, and privacy-focused solutions like SKAdNetwork on iOS.</li>
<li id="htoc-unified-analytics-mmps-act-as-a-single-source-of-truth-that-provide-clear-comparison-and-help-with-strategic-decisions-based-on-consolidated-data"><strong>Unified analytics</strong> – MMPs act as a single source of truth that provide clear comparison and help with strategic decisions based on consolidated data.</li>
</ol>
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="htoc-why-are-mmps-essential-for-app-marketers">Why are MMPs essential for app marketers?</h2>
<p>Mobile Measurement Partners are essential for app marketers because they provide the clarity and security needed to run effective app campaigns. Their core value is demonstrated in several key areas:</p>
<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li id="htoc-impartial-measurement-and-unbiased-attribution-which-is-a-must-for-evaluating-mobile-marketing-roi-and-allocating-budget-efficiently">Impartial measurement and <strong>unbiased attribution</strong>, which is a must for evaluating mobile marketing ROI and allocating budget efficiently</li>
<li id="htoc-they-pull-and-consolidate-data-from-all-ad-networks-into-a-single-dashboard-to-eliminate-fragmentation-and-create-actionable-insights">They pull and <strong>consolidate data</strong> from all ad networks into a single dashboard to eliminate fragmentation and create actionable insights</li>
<li id="htoc-most-top-mmps-include-robust-fraud-detection-tools-to-protect-marketing-budgets-from-invalid-activity">Most top MMPs include <strong>robust fraud detection</strong> tools to protect marketing budgets from invalid activity.</li>
<li id="htoc-they-help-marketers-with-privacy-compliance-and-to-navigate-complex-global-privacy-regulations-like-gdpr-ccpa-and-apple-s-att-framework">They help marketers with <strong>privacy compliance</strong> and to navigate complex global privacy regulations like GDPR, CCPA, and Apple’s ATT framework.</li>
<li id="htoc-the-real-time-analytics-of-mmps-allow-marketers-to-optimize-campaigns-rapidly-iterate-and-improve-performance-based-on-reliable-data">The real-time analytics of MMPs allow marketers to <strong>optimize campaigns</strong>, rapidly iterate and improve performance based on reliable data.</li>
</ul>
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="htoc-what-are-the-best-mobile-measurement-partners-for-2025">What are the best mobile measurement partners for 2025?</h2>
<p>Below is the concise feature-by-feature breakdown of the top MMPs available in 2025. Each tool is listed by name and accompanied by a clear summary of its features, unique options, standout capabilities, and who it’s best suited for.</p>
<div class="wp-block-cta">
<div class="cta cta--theme-acq">
<div class="cta__content">
<div class="cta__content-text">

Create Free Account                </a></div><img decoding="async" src="https://splitmetrics.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/analyze-tablet-desktop-3.png" class="cta__image cta__image--custom" alt="8 Best Mobile Measurement Partners (MMPs) to Consider for Your Mobile App Attribution in 2025"></div></div><h3 class="wp-block-heading" id="htoc-list-of-the-best-mobile-measurement-partners-in-2022">Adjust</h3>
<div class="wp-block-image"> <figure class="aligncenter size-large"><a href="https://splitmetrics.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/1-2.png"><img fetchpriority="high" decoding="async" width="1024" height="812" src="https://splitmetrics.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/1-2-1024x812.png" alt="8 Best Mobile Measurement Partners (MMPs) to Consider for Your Mobile App Attribution in 2025" class="wp-image-29284" srcset="https://splitmetrics.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/1-2-1024x812.png 1024w, https://splitmetrics.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/1-2-300x238.png 300w, https://splitmetrics.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/1-2-768x609.png 768w, https://splitmetrics.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/1-2-1536x1218.png 1536w, https://splitmetrics.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/1-2-250x198.png 250w, https://splitmetrics.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/1-2-499x396.png 499w, https://splitmetrics.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/1-2-509x404.png 509w, https://splitmetrics.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/1-2-1019x808.png 1019w, https://splitmetrics.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/1-2-350x278.png 350w, https://splitmetrics.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/1-2-700x555.png 700w, https://splitmetrics.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/1-2.png 1780w" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px"></a><figcaption class="wp-element-caption">Source: Adjust</figcaption></figure></div><p>Everyone who devoted their career to the mobile industry has heard of <a href="https://www.adjust.com/">Adjust</a>, <strong>one of the leading mobile measurement partners in the world</strong>. They’ve been around since 2012 and established themselves as the company with the highest safety standards. One of the principles of their business is “<strong>security and user privacy is at the heart of what we do</strong>”. </p>
<p>Adjust is a trusted partner of thousands of apps and brands. Their customer list includes Yelp, Booking.com, Soundcloud, Spotify, and many others.</p>
<h4 class="wp-block-heading" id="htoc-what-we-love-about-adjust-as-an-mmp">What We Love About Adjust as an MMP:</h4>
<p>Adjust is widely considered to be one of the most renowned mobile measurement partners. Here are some of the benefits the platform guarantees users: </p>
<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li id="htoc-the-company-gives-you-unlimited-access-to-data-enjoy-raw-data-and-information-about-callbacks-custom-events-api-pulls-etc-to-the-fullest1">The company gives you <strong>unlimited access to data</strong>. Enjoy raw data and information about callbacks, custom events, API pulls, etc. to the fullest!</li>
<li id="htoc-you-re-perfectly-safe-with-adjust-as-it-invests-into-cybersecurity-and-enlists-top-notch-solutions-their-proactive-filters-keep-fraud-activities-at-bay-nothing-suspicious-will-get-to-the-point-of-attribution1">You’re perfectly safe with Adjust as it invests into cybersecurity and enlists top-notch solutions. <strong>Their proactive filters keep fraud activities at bay</strong>. Nothing suspicious will get to the point of attribution.</li>
<li id="htoc-this-mmp-equips-you-with-powerful-marketing-automation-tools-so-you-can-manage-your-campaigns-right-from-adjust-s-dashboard1">This MMP equips you with powerful <strong>marketing automation tools</strong> so you can manage your campaigns right from Adjust’s dashboard.</li>
<li id="htoc-their-support-system-quality-is-unmatched-you-get-answers-from-their-experts-real-quick-the-customer-support-team-even-won-the-adexchanger-global-client-services-award-in-20211">Their <strong>support system quality</strong> is unmatched, you get answers from their experts real quick. The customer support team even won the AdExchanger Global Client Services award in 2021.</li>
<li id="htoc-adjust-attribution-makes-it-easy-to-understand-which-of-your-creatives-really-work-and-bring-users-to-you1">Adjust attribution makes it easy to <strong>understand which of your creatives really work</strong> and bring users to you. </li>
<li id="htoc-they-take-into-account-the-needs-of-different-companies-and-have-pricing-packages-base-core-enterprise-for-everyone-from-indie-developers-to-corporations1"><strong>They take into account the needs of different companies</strong> and have pricing packages (Base, Core, Enterprise) for everyone, from indie developers to corporations. </li>

<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="htoc-how-does-mmp-pricing-work">How does MMP pricing work?</h2>
<p>MMPs are structured around several models designed to fit different app sizes and data needs. Costs are typically influenced by event volume, feature access, data granularity, and contract terms. </p>
<p>Here are the most common questions you should have answered.</p>
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" id="htoc-do-any-mmps-offer-free-plans">Do any MMPs offer free plans?</h3>
<p>Yes, several MMPs provide free entry-level plans that are ideal for new apps, MVPs, or testing attribution features. These plans, such as AppsFlyer’s Zero Plan or offerings from Tenjin, typically cover a limited number of conversions or events before requiring an upgrade to a paid tier.</p>
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" id="htoc-what-is-usage-based-billing-for-mmps">What is usage-based billing for MMPs?</h3>
<p>Usage-based billing is the most common <strong>MMP pricing</strong> model, where costs scale directly with app activity. Leading providers like AppsFlyer, Kochava, and Singular charge based on the volume of events tracked, such as app installs, specific attributions, or custom in-app events logged by the user.</p>
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" id="htoc-are-there-monthly-minimum-fees-for-mmps">Are there monthly minimum fees for MMPs?</h3>
<p>Some MMP platforms require a minimum monthly subscription fee for access to premium features, even if event volume is low. This model, used by providers like Kochava and Tenjin, often bundles a specific range of usage and ensures a baseline level of service and support.</p>
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" id="htoc-do-mmps-offer-custom-enterprise-pricing">Do MMPs offer custom enterprise pricing?</h3>
<p>Custom enterprise pricing is a tailored quote created for high-volume or high-needs clients. MMPs like Adjust and AppsFlyer develop these plans based on factors like app size, specific data requirements, the number of integrations needed, and the expected level of customer support.</p>
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" id="htoc-how-do-features-affect-mmp-pricing">How do features affect MMP pricing?</h3>
<p>Advanced features directly impact the overall cost of an MMP subscription. Capabilities such as real-time data exports, sophisticated fraud protection suites, or creative analytics are often reserved for higher pricing tiers or are sold separately as paid add-ons to a base plan.</p>
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" id="htoc-does-accessing-raw-data-cost-extra">Does accessing raw data cost extra?</h3>
<p>Accessing raw data pipelines and unlimited historical data often incurs extra fees in an MMP pricing structure. This granular level of data access is important for advanced analytics teams who need to perform deep-dive analysis and providers typically charge a premium for this capability.</p>
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" id="htoc-what-are-other-common-mmp-costs">What are other common MMP costs?</h3>
<p>Beyond standard subscriptions, you may encounter other costs associated with MMP services. Be sure to confirm these potential fees when evaluating platforms:</p>
<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li id="htoc-paid-trials-some-mmps-offer-paid-proof-of-concept-poc-periods-for-enterprise-buyers-to-validate-the-platform"><strong>Paid Trials:</strong> Some MMPs offer paid proof-of-concept (POC) periods for enterprise buyers to validate the platform.</li>
<li id="htoc-onboarding-fees-enterprise-level-contracts-may-include-mandatory-fees-for-setup-and-team-onboarding"><strong>Onboarding Fees:</strong> Enterprise-level contracts may include mandatory fees for setup and team onboarding.</li>
<li id="htoc-annual-contracts-higher-level-or-custom-contracts-often-require-an-annual-commitment-rather-than-a-month-to-month-agreement"><strong>Annual Contracts:</strong> Higher-level or custom contracts often require an annual commitment rather than a month-to-month agreement.</li>
</ul>
<p>MMP features feature lists change fast, especially as AI features are growing rapidly – if you plan to buy the attribution tool, you should confirm the specifics with vendors.</p>
<h2 class="wp-block-heading" id="htoc-what-should-you-consider-before-choosing-an-mmp">What should you consider before choosing an MMP?</h2>
<p>Choosing an MMP requires a strategic evaluation of your technical, business and compliance needs. Key considerations range from your app’s current scale and data requirements to the platform’s integration capabilities, support structure, and overall market reputation. A thorough review ensures you select a partner that aligns with your long-term growth goals.</p>
<p>Make sure to check the questions below, as they will guide you during the research phase.</p>
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" id="htoc-why-is-app-scale-important-for-choosing-an-mmp">Why is app scale important for choosing an MMP?</h3>
<p>Your app’s current and anticipated scale is a critical factor because you must choose a solution that scales affordably with your growth. Assess your present install and event volume, but also forecast future needs to ensure the MMP pricing model will not become prohibitively expensive as your user base expands.</p>
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" id="htoc-how-do-data-export-needs-affect-your-mmp-choice">How do data export needs affect your MMP choice?</h3>
<p>Your data export needs directly impact both the price and platform choice for an MMP. You must determine if your team requires real-time, raw event or campaign data for deep analysis. Access to granular data pipelines is often a premium feature that not all providers offer in their standard tiers.</p>
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" id="htoc-what-fraud-and-privacy-features-should-you-evaluate">What fraud and privacy features should you evaluate?</h3>
<p>You should evaluate each MMP’s approach to privacy compliance and fraud protection. Assess their tools for adhering to regulations like GDPR, CCPA, and Apple’s ATT framework. Additionally, determine if advanced fraud prevention is a critical requirement for your industry vertical to protect your marketing budget.</p>
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" id="htoc-why-are-integrations-a-critical-factor">Why are integrations a critical factor?</h3>
<p>Integrations are critical because your MMP must seamlessly connect with your existing marketing and analytics stack. Check for direct support for your preferred ad networks, CRM, and business intelligence platforms to ensure cohesive cross-channel campaign measurement, including web, mobile, CTV, and offline channels.</p>
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" id="htoc-what-level-of-support-should-you-look-for">What level of support should you look for?</h3>
<p>Enterprises should consider the level and speed of support offered by the MMP. This includes evaluating Service Level Agreements (SLAs), the quality of the onboarding process, and whether you will have access to dedicated representatives for timely and effective technical assistance.</p>
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" id="htoc-how-does-geography-influence-your-mmp-selection">How does geography influence your MMP selection?</h3>
<p>Geography is a key consideration if you operate globally or in data-restricted regions like China, Korea, or the EU. Ensure the MMP has the necessary server infrastructure and compliance coverage in those locales to meet local data residency and privacy laws without compromising performance.</p>
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" id="htoc-what-should-you-look-for-in-mmp-analytics-and-reporting">What should you look for in MMP analytics and reporting?</h3>
<p>When evaluating <strong>app analytics</strong>, review how granular and customizable the MMP’s reporting is. Look for the ability to conduct detailed analysis on specific segments, user cohorts, and multi-touch attribution paths. This depth is essential for gaining actionable insights from your marketing data.</p>
<h3 class="wp-block-heading" id="htoc-how-should-platform-strengths-and-reputation-guide-your-decision">How should platform strengths and reputation guide your decision?</h3>
<p>You should align an MMP’s proven strengths with your specific use case, as some platforms excel in gaming, e-commerce, or B2B. Supplement this by checking</p>
